Module it.polimi.is24am05
Package it.polimi.is24am05.model.playArea

Class SideDisplayer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.is24am05.model.playArea.SideDisplayer
public class SideDisplayer extends Object
This class implements the methods to display a card as a string

  • Method Details

    • sideToString

      public static String[][] sideToString(Side toDraw)
      Allows to draw a card Side
      Parameters:
      toDraw - the side to draw
      Returns:
      A 3 x 3 string matrix. The first and the last columns are 1 character wide, the center is 7 characters wide.

    • sideToString

      public static String[][] sideToString(Resource resource, boolean isGold)
      Parameters:
      resource - Resource
      Returns:
      The generic back side of a Card of the same color of th Resource

    • emptySideToString

      public static String[][] emptySideToString(Tuple originalCoord)
      Parameters:
      originalCoord - Coordinates in the PlayArea of the side
      Returns:
      A matrix equivalent to a sideToString() in terms of dimensions and length of the Strings. It represents a spot where a card can be placed.

    • blankToString

      public static String[][] blankToString()
      Returns:
      A matrix equivalent to a sideToString() in terms of dimensions and length of the Strings, however all the strings are empty.

    • blankToString

      public static String[][] blankToString(String borderChar)

    • getCardColor

      public static String getCardColor(Side toDraw)
      Parameters:
      toDraw - Side to get the color
      Returns:
      the color corresponding to the card seed

    • getElementColor

      protected static String getElementColor(Element element)
      Maps an element to its color
      Parameters:
      element - resource to get the color
      Returns:
      the color corresponding to the card seed

    • getElementLetter

      public static String getElementLetter(Element element)
      Maps an element to a Letter for display
      Parameters:
      element - to display
      Returns:
      the corresponding letter (String of length 1)

    • getCentreToString

      static String getCentreToString(Side side)
      Parameters:
      side - side to draw
      Returns:
      a string of length CardWidth representing the center of the side
